'''''Icebound Oath''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to use an {{Ousia}} attack to remove the shield that [[Icewind Suite|Coppelius]] deploys during the performance's climax.
